questions.quote: Why don't we just throw a Molotov cocktail through their window?
Are you kidding? I could spot that bird's nest two blocks away.
I love shrimp!  I'm a shrimp eater. You put shrimp infront of me,  and I will eat it until my stomach pops!  Oh..
Well who's gonna turn down a Junior Mint? It's chocolate, it's peppermint-- it's *delicious*!
You know, everybody listens to the Chinese. I mean, look at the fortune cookie. You couldn't get away with that in any other restaurant.
Oh...uh, because if it had anything at all to do with what you perceived as me leering at your daughter, I really have to take issue with that. I did not leer.  Did I leer?
We all want the hand. Hand is tough to get. You gotta get the hand right from the opening.
Because of Divola! Get in here... How come you're not dressed?
Well, George told me the whole story, line for line, I mean I almost feel like I've seen it already and walked out on it.
Look Hubert. It's the mailman. You remember the mailman don't you.
